entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 30%
